field.name: summary
field.value: More sections for fancy foreach loops

field.name: description
field.value: We currently have #before and #after (used for #each), aswell as #beforeall and #afterall (used for the whole loop). #odd and #even can be used to replace #each but then you have to have 2 copies of the HTML. I propose to add #beforeodd, #afterodd, #beforeeven and #aftereven. This would allow me to write a table that is 2 columns wide (2 x [header+data]) when the headers are vertical. I am aware that #odd and would be the same as the proposed #beforeodd but that is the same as #each and #before. Example: #foreach ($item in $items) #beforeodd #each ... ... #aftereven #end

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: I am now closing this issue with won't fix because I now see this as a bad idea. The more sections the more complex the view gets. I would have used a view component or a helper to make it reusable and cleaner.
